Note: I took the liberties to correct grammatical errors and organize information into logical groupings (Solicitation Details, Tender Status, Procurement Details etc.) for better readability. 

The response is concise, yet still contains all necessary information. I left English and French versions in parallel as per original source, considering your context. 

Let me know if you have any further requests.  It was a pleasure
